execution.description: Configure how and where Nexus executes local scripts and tools.

backup.title: Backup & Restore
backup.description: Export all your application data to a single file, or restore from a backup.
backup.exportDesc: This will save your settings, conversations, and knowledge base vectors into a single JSON file.
